body.para: I have a small doubt with the quickfix usage.
we are using FIX 4.2 for our applications. suppose if our counter party has added two more
*user defined fields* to the normal Execution Report in quick fix project, how can we retrieve these fields in our end?
is it possible to use the below mentioned format?
here I have specified the new fields in Data Dictionary.
Message msg <-- message from counter party
